content: *r s v p knit yourself this vintage nine way hat here s the best of new ideas for any really special vintage patterns smart girl nine hats for less than the price of any one you could buy step into the limelight with this dutch bonnet exciting fashion that s gay new and sophisticated sideways different drape pert little cap cute tailored pillbox and more… these and a host of becoming shapes to match your mood or your wardrobe all come from the one simple to crochet tube make it in several colours or just one and dress it up with any flowers feathers ribbon or odd bits of jewellery you posses © copyright pamela walker 2007 1 materials 4 oz patons beehive fingering 3 ply patonised no 11 phantom crochet hook gauge 8 row to 1 inch starting at one end make a chain 26 inches long row 1 d c in 3rd chain from hook * 1chain miss next chain d c in next chain repeat from * until row measures 22 inches or required head measurement cut off remaining chain 2 chain and turn row 2 - * d c in next space 1 chain repeat from * ending with d c in turning chain 2 chain turn repeat 2nd row until piece measures 15 inches from starting chain fasten_off making up press work with warm iron and damp cloth join 15 inch sides enjoy your crochet © copyright pamela walker 2007 2 really special vintage patterns make yourself a 9 way hat 1951 *r s v p the knitted version original pattern is for crochet only materials this is a simple pattern which allows you to create your own unique hats providing 3ply wool you can obtain the original sizing try out a variety of pattern stitches change the pair of no 10 knitting pins size of your pins and knit with a modern yarn imagine this in an eyelash pinned gauge into shape with a huge sparkly brooch 2 = 13 sts 10 row = 1 many hats were created in this way during the war as yarn patterns and clothing were in short supply to make cast on 143 stitches photo opposite shows rib or french method work 1 row plain knitting 2nd row moss stitch throughout knit 1 purl 1 to end 3rd row repeat row 2 continue in this way until work measures 15 inches long press carefully if required join side seam on the original pattern the top of the hat happy knitting and hatting is left open for you to manipulate the hat to whatever is your chosen design © copyright pamela walker 2007 *r s v p
